body_html: Ah, you are right with respect to numbering, my bad. Nonfused winograd is not returned in fastest (cudnnGet*), and benchmark (cudnnFind*) returns a table of results, so they can be filtered in the framework if someone does not want to use Winograd or non-fused winograd. No way to prevent cudnnGet from returning (fused) winograd, AFAIK.

body: Ah, you are right with respect to numbering, my bad. Nonfused winograd is not returned in fastest (cudnnGet*), and benchmark (cudnnFind*) returns a table of results, so they can be filtered in the framework if someone does not want to use Winograd or non-fused winograd. No way to prevent cudnnGet from returning (fused) winograd, AFAIK.
